title: travelplanner: Can you arrange a 7-day trip for 2 people departing from Washington and visiting 3 cities in New York? The trip will be from March 13th to March 19th, 2022, with a budget of $5,500. We would prefer accommodations with smoking house rules. (fe809711ed0612a4)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan with the `submit_day_plan` function for each day of the trip!

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
## New York City Trip Plan

**Travel Dates:** March 13 - March 19, 2022
**Accommodation Budget:** $5,500

### Flight Details
I found several flight options for your departure date of March 13th, with prices ranging from $48 to $112. Here are some of the options:
- Flight F3687232: departing at 08:14 and arriving at 10:06, costing $53
- Flight F3708144: departing at 16:53 and arriving at 17:57, costing $74
- Flight F3927510: departing at 08:07 and arriving at 09:29, costing $75
- Flight F4065261: departing at 21:06 and arriving at 22:58, costing $98

Please note that these prices and timings may vary and are subject to change. You can use the flight number to search for and book the flights that best suit your preferences.

### Accommodation Options:
- **Large Bed-Stuy Apartment**: Located in New York City, this entire home/apt costs $132 per night and has a 4-night minimum stay, with no visitors allowed.
- **Sunny + Spacious Master Bedroom**: A private room with outdoor access for $109 per night and a 3-night minimum stay. No pets are allowed.
- **Magical rowhouse and garden in Williamsburg**: This entire home/apt costs $189 per night with a 4-night minimum stay and a maximum occupancy of 3. No parties are permitted.
- **IN MINT CONDITION-1BR&TERRACE**: This entire home/apt is $297 per night and requires a 30-night minimum stay. No pets are allowed.

Please note that the house rules vary across these accommodations, so be sure to check the specific rules for each before booking.

### Top Attractions in New York City:
- **Top of the Rock**: Offers stunning views from the observation deck at Rockefeller Plaza.
- **One World Observatory**: Another incredible viewpoint to admire the cityscape.
- **Empire State Building**: A classic New York City icon with an observation deck.
- **Statue of Liberty**: A must-see for any visitor to New York.
- **Central Park**: A vast urban park with plenty of green spaces and activities.
- **Times Square**: The famous intersection known for its bright lights and bustling atmosphere.
- **Brooklyn Bridge**: A historic landmark and a great spot for photos.

### Restaurant Recommendations:
- **Seasons 52 Fresh Grill**: Enjoy seafood, Indian, and Italian cuisine with an average cost of $30.
- **Lord of the Drinks Forum**: A cafe serving a mix of cuisines including bakery items, BBQ, and Chinese, with an average cost of $71.
- **Green Chick Chop**: Offering tea, French, cafe, and seafood options for an average of $26.
- **G Dot**: A cafe serving Mexican, BBQ, and American dishes for around $75.

### Day-by-Day Itinerary:
**Day 1 (March 13)**:
- Arrive in New York City and check into your accommodation.
- Visit Times Square to take in the vibrant atmosphere and bright lights.
- Explore Central Park and enjoy a leisurely stroll or rent a bike.
- Have dinner at Seasons 52 Fresh Grill.

**Day 2 (March 14)**:
- Visit the Statue of Liberty and take a ferry ride for a closer look.
- Head to the Brooklyn Bridge for a walk and enjoy the views.
- Try some of New York's famous pizza at Domino's Pizza or Shree Rathnam.

**Day 3 (March 15)**:
- Go up to the observation deck at the Empire State Building for panoramic views.
- Explore the bustling neighborhood of Manhattan and its diverse attractions.
- Enjoy dinner at Aryan's Rajasthani Pyaz Ki Kachori, a unique Indian spot.

**Day 4 (March 16)**:
- Visit Rockefeller Center and take a tour of the iconic complex.
- Attend a show at Radio City Music Hall for an evening of entertainment.
- Grab a quick bite at Golooji's Chat Waat or Green Restaurant for some pizza and BBQ.

**Day 5 (March 17)**:
- Spend the day at Central Park, renting a rowboat, visiting the zoo, or exploring the gardens.
- Head to the nearby Magical rowhouse and garden in Williamsburg for a relaxing evening.
- Dinner at G Dot or Green Chick Chop.

**Day 6 (March 18)**:
- Visit the 9/11 Memorial & Museum to learn about the city's history.
- Enjoy a walk through The Channel Gardens and The Battery for some peaceful green spaces.
- Try some delicious desserts at Sugary Affairs or Sugar Rush.

**Day 7 (March 19)**:
- End your trip with a visit to Top of the Rock for one last incredible view of the city.
- Have a final meal at Lord of the Drinks Forum or Baltazar for a mix of cuisines.
- Catch your flight home or continue your journey to the next destination.

Please note that this plan provides suggestions, and you can adjust or add activities based on your preferences and the specific dates of your visit.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
